title: Pod to Survive with George Russell
description:
It may be Wednesday, but he’s Mr. Saturday to you. This week, the boys are Zooming in Formula 1 driver for Mercedes George Russell thanks to their friends at Belstaff. George is coming to us from across the pond for an early morning session on F1’s newfound American fandom, the hardest part about being a racecar driver that the average person might not be aware of, getting called up to the big leagues, how his 2022 season success has ratcheted up the pressure, a podium of the sport’s best-dressed, classic British style, what he thinks of Nascar, whip appeal off the track, his first and dream cars, how he unwinds, date night with his girl and her influence on his wardrobe, that time his house caught on fire, last meals and much more on this fast and friendly episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
